output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF (CMF: 11240017) - Yes, this indicates it's electoral propaganda 2. Refers to candidate (Marcel Ciolacu) - Yes, who is a presidential candidate 3. Addresses wide population - Yes, it's a paid post with significant reach (2000-2999 impressions) 4. Electoral objective - Yes, it promotes Marcel Ciolacu's achievement as Prime Minister 5. Journalism - No, this is clearly promotional content 6. Personal opinion - No, this is an official party communication (PSD Dolj)
The post promotes Marcel Ciolacu's achievement regarding Romania's Schengen accession. While this could be seen as government communication, several factors make it electoral propaganda: - Use of hashtags like #MarcelCiolacu and #PSD - Presence of CMF number - Timing during electoral period - Paid promotion - Party attribution (PSD Dolj)

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Official party communication (PSD Dolj) - Promotes a presidential candidate's achievements - Contains CMF number - Is a paid advertisement - Uses campaign hashtags - Targets large audience (100,001-500,000 people)
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Dolj, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala (ID Facebook: 1644691303149522) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie, respectiv dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea promoveaza realizarile candidatului prezidential Marcel Ciolacu, folosind hashtag-uri electorale (#MarcelCiolacu, #PSD), continand numar CMF (11240017) si fiind promovata platit pe platformele Facebook si Instagram catre un public tinta de 100.001-500.000 persoane, cu scopul evident de influentare a votului.
